task_rewards.aesthetics_reason: The map is visually barren, consisting only of a straight line of brick blocks. It lacks any thematic design, variation, or visual appeal, resulting in a plain and uninteresting appearance.
task_rewards.originality_reason: The design is the most basic and unoriginal concept possible for a level: a straight, empty path to the goal. It demonstrates a complete lack of creative or unique ideas.
task_rewards.fairness_reason: The level is perfectly fair because it contains no hazards, enemies, or challenges of any kind. It is impossible for the player to be harmed or lose a life.
task_rewards.fun_reason: The map provides no entertainment value as it lacks any form of challenge, interaction, or engagement. The experience of simply holding right for two seconds is devoid of fun.
task_rewards.difficulty_reason: The map has zero difficulty. With no obstacles, pits, or enemies, it requires no skill to complete and poses no challenge to the player.
